name: io.github.QuackbackIO/quackback
description: Open-source feedback platform. Agents can search, triage, comment, vote, and manage changelogs.

host.description: Hostname of your Quackback instance (e.g., feedback.yourcompany.com)

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search feedback posts or changelog entries with filtering and pagination

tools.name: get_details
tools.description: Get full details for any entity by TypeID (post, changelog)

tools.name: triage_post
tools.description: Update a post: set status, tags, and/or owner

tools.name: vote_post
tools.description: Toggle vote on a feedback post

tools.name: add_comment
tools.description: Post a comment on a feedback post, with threaded reply support

tools.name: create_post
tools.description: Submit new feedback on a board

tools.name: create_changelog
tools.description: Create a changelog entry (draft or published)

tools.name: update_changelog
tools.description: Update title, content, publish state, and linked posts on a changelog

tools.name: delete_comment
tools.description: Hard-delete a comment and its replies

tools.name: react_to_comment
tools.description: Add or remove an emoji reaction on a comment

tools.name: manage_roadmap_post
tools.description: Add or remove a post from a roadmap

tools.name: merge_post
tools.description: Merge a duplicate post into a canonical post

tools.name: unmerge_post
tools.description: Restore a merged post to independent state
